021import com.plotsquared.bukkit.util.BukkitUtil;

023import com.sk89q.jnbt.CompoundTag;
024import com.sk89q.jnbt.ListTag;
025import com.sk89q.jnbt.ShortTag;
026import com.sk89q.jnbt.StringTag;
027import com.sk89q.jnbt.Tag;
028import com.sk89q.worldedit.blocks.BaseItemStack;
029import com.sk89q.worldedit.bukkit.BukkitAdapter;
030import com.sk89q.worldedit.world.item.ItemType;
031import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
032import org.bukkit.ChatColor;
033import org.bukkit.World;
034import org.bukkit.block.Block;
035import org.bukkit.block.Container;
036import org.bukkit.block.Sign;
037import org.bukkit.block.Skull;
038import org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment;
039import org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory;
040import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
041import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
042
043import java.util.ArrayList;
044import java.util.HashMap;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Map;
047import java.util.Map.Entry;
048
049public class StateWrapper {
050
051    public org.bukkit.block.BlockState state = null;
052    public CompoundTag tag = null;
053
054    public StateWrapper(CompoundTag tag) {
055        this.tag = tag;
056    }
057
058    public static String jsonToColourCode(String str) {
059        str = str.replace("{\"extra\":", "").replace("],\"text\":\"\"}", "]")
060                .replace("[{\"color\":\"black\",\"text\":\"", "&0")
061                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"text\":\"", "&1")
062                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"text\":\"", "&2")
063                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&3")
064                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"text\":\"", "&4")
065                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&5")
066                .replace("[{\"color\":\"gold\",\"text\":\"", "&6")
067                .replace("[{\"color\":\"gray\",\"text\":\"", "&7")
068                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"text\":\"", "&8")
069                .replace("[{\"color\":\"blue\",\"text\":\"", "&9")
070                .replace("[{\"color\":\"green\",\"text\":\"", "&a")
071                .replace("[{\"color\":\"aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&b")
072                .replace("[{\"color\":\"red\",\"text\":\"", "&c")
073                .replace("[{\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&d")
074                .replace("[{\"color\":\"yellow\",\"text\":\"", "&e")
075                .replace("[{\"color\":\"white\",\"text\":\"", "&f")
076                .replace("[{\"obfuscated\":true,\"text\":\"", "&k")
077                .replace("[{\"bold\":true,\"text\":\"", "&l")
078                .replace("[{\"strikethrough\":true,\"text\":\"", "&m")
079                .replace("[{\"underlined\":true,\"text\":\"", "&n")
080                .replace("[{\"italic\":true,\"text\":\"", "&o").replace("[{\"color\":\"black\",", "&0")
081                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_blue\",", "&1")
082                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_green\",", "&2")
083                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",", "&3").replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_red\",", "&4")
084                .replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_purple\",", "&5").replace("[{\"color\":\"gold\",", "&6")
085                .replace("[{\"color\":\"gray\",", "&7").replace("[{\"color\":\"dark_gray\",", "&8")
086                .replace("[{\"color\":\"blue\",", "&9").replace("[{\"color\":\"green\",", "&a")
087                .replace("[{\"color\":\"aqua\",", "&b").replace("[{\"color\":\"red\",", "&c")
088                .replace("[{\"color\":\"light_purple\",", "&d").replace("[{\"color\":\"yellow\",", "&e")
089                .replace("[{\"color\":\"white\",", "&f").replace("[{\"obfuscated\":true,", "&k")
090                .replace("[{\"bold\":true,", "&l").replace("[{\"strikethrough\":true,", "&m")
091                .replace("[{\"underlined\":true,", "&n").replace("[{\"italic\":true,", "&o")
092                .replace("{\"color\":\"black\",\"text\":\"", "&0")
093                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"text\":\"", "&1")
094                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"text\":\"", "&2")
095                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&3")
096                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"text\":\"", "&4")
097                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&5")
098                .replace("{\"color\":\"gold\",\"text\":\"", "&6")
099                .replace("{\"color\":\"gray\",\"text\":\"", "&7")
100                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"text\":\"", "&8")
101                .replace("{\"color\":\"blue\",\"text\":\"", "&9")
102                .replace("{\"color\":\"green\",\"text\":\"", "&a")
103                .replace("{\"color\":\"aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&b")
104                .replace("{\"color\":\"red\",\"text\":\"", "&c")
105                .replace("{\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&d")
106                .replace("{\"color\":\"yellow\",\"text\":\"", "&e")
107                .replace("{\"color\":\"white\",\"text\":\"", "&f")
108                .replace("{\"obfuscated\":true,\"text\":\"", "&k")
109                .replace("{\"bold\":true,\"text\":\"", "&l")
110                .replace("{\"strikethrough\":true,\"text\":\"", "&m")
111                .replace("{\"underlined\":true,\"text\":\"", "&n")
112                .replace("{\"italic\":true,\"text\":\"", "&o").replace("{\"color\":\"black\",", "&0")
113                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_blue\",", "&1").replace("{\"color\":\"dark_green\",", "&2")
114                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",", "&3").replace("{\"color\":\"dark_red\",", "&4")
115                .replace("{\"color\":\"dark_purple\",", "&5").replace("{\"color\":\"gold\",", "&6")
116                .replace("{\"color\":\"gray\",", "&7").replace("{\"color\":\"dark_gray\",", "&8")
117                .replace("{\"color\":\"blue\",", "&9").replace("{\"color\":\"green\",", "&a")
118                .replace("{\"color\":\"aqua\",", "&b").replace("{\"color\":\"red\",", "&c")
119                .replace("{\"color\":\"light_purple\",", "&d").replace("{\"color\":\"yellow\",", "&e")
120                .replace("{\"color\":\"white\",", "&f").replace("{\"obfuscated\":true,", "&k")
121                .replace("{\"bold\":true,", "&l").replace("{\"strikethrough\":true,", "&m")
122                .replace("{\"underlined\":true,", "&n").replace("{\"italic\":true,", "&o")
123                .replace("\"color\":\"black\",\"text\":\"", "&0")
124                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_blue\",\"text\":\"", "&1")
125                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"text\":\"", "&2")
126                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&3")
127                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"text\":\"", "&4")
128                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&5")
129                .replace("\"color\":\"gold\",\"text\":\"", "&6")
130                .replace("\"color\":\"gray\",\"text\":\"", "&7")
131                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"text\":\"", "&8")
132                .replace("\"color\":\"blue\",\"text\":\"", "&9")
133                .replace("\"color\":\"green\",\"text\":\"", "&a")
134                .replace("\"color\":\"aqua\",\"text\":\"", "&b")
135                .replace("\"color\":\"red\",\"text\":\"", "&c")
136                .replace("\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"text\":\"", "&d")
137                .replace("\"color\":\"yellow\",\"text\":\"", "&e")
138                .replace("\"color\":\"white\",\"text\":\"", "&f")
139                .replace("\"obfuscated\":true,\"text\":\"", "&k")
140                .replace("\"bold\":true,\"text\":\"", "&l")
141                .replace("\"strikethrough\":true,\"text\":\"", "&m")
142                .replace("\"underlined\":true,\"text\":\"", "&n")
143                .replace("\"italic\":true,\"text\":\"", "&o").replace("\"color\":\"black\",", "&0")
144                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_blue\",", "&1").replace("\"color\":\"dark_green\",", "&2")
145                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",", "&3").replace("\"color\":\"dark_red\",", "&4")
146                .replace("\"color\":\"dark_purple\",", "&5").replace("\"color\":\"gold\",", "&6")
147                .replace("\"color\":\"gray\",", "&7").replace("\"color\":\"dark_gray\",", "&8")
148                .replace("\"color\":\"blue\",", "&9").replace("\"color\":\"green\",", "&a")
149                .replace("\"color\":\"aqua\",", "&b").replace("\"color\":\"red\",", "&c")
150                .replace("\"color\":\"light_purple\",", "&d").replace("\"color\":\"yellow\",", "&e")
151                .replace("\"color\":\"white\",", "&f").replace("\"obfuscated\":true,", "&k")
152                .replace("\"bold\":true,", "&l").replace("\"strikethrough\":true,", "&m")
153                .replace("\"underlined\":true,", "&n").replace("\"italic\":true,", "&o")
154                .replace("[{\"text\":\"", "&0").replace("{\"text\":\"", "&0").replace("\"},", "")
155                .replace("\"}]", "").replace("\"}", "");
156        str = ChatColor.translateAlternateColorCodes('&', str);
157        return str;
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Restore the TileEntity data to the given world at the given coordinates.
162     *
163     * @param worldName World name
164     * @param x         x position
165     * @param y         y position
166     * @param z         z position
167     * @return true if successful
168     */
169    public boolean restoreTag(String worldName, int x, int y, int z) {
170        World world = BukkitUtil.getWorld(worldName);
171        if (world == null) {
172            return false;
173        }
174        return restoreTag(world.getBlockAt(x, y, z));
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Restore the TileEntity data to the given block
179     *
180     * @param block Block to restore to
181     * @return true if successful
182     */
183    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // #setLine is needed for Spigot compatibility
184    public boolean restoreTag(@NonNull Block block) {
185        if (this.tag == null) {
186            return false;
187        }
188        org.bukkit.block.BlockState state = block.getState();
189        switch (getId()) {
190            case "chest", "beacon", "brewingstand", "dispenser", "dropper", "furnace", "hopper", "shulkerbox" -> {
191                if (!(state instanceof Container container)) {
192                    return false;
193                }
194                List<Tag> itemsTag = this.tag.getListTag("Items").getValue();
195                Inventory inv = container.getSnapshotInventory();
196                for (Tag itemTag : itemsTag) {
197                    CompoundTag itemComp = (CompoundTag) itemTag;
198                    ItemType type = ItemType.REGISTRY.get(itemComp.getString("id").toLowerCase());
199                    if (type == null) {
200                        continue;
201                    }
202                    int count = itemComp.getByte("Count");
203                    int slot = itemComp.getByte("Slot");
204                    CompoundTag tag = (CompoundTag) itemComp.getValue().get("tag");
205                    BaseItemStack baseItemStack = new BaseItemStack(type, tag, count);
206                    ItemStack itemStack = BukkitAdapter.adapt(baseItemStack);
207                    inv.setItem(slot, itemStack);
208                }
209                container.update(true, false);
210                return true;
211            }
212            case "sign" -> {
213                if (state instanceof Sign sign) {
214                    sign.setLine(0, jsonToColourCode(tag.getString("Text1")));
215                    sign.setLine(1, jsonToColourCode(tag.getString("Text2")));
216                    sign.setLine(2, jsonToColourCode(tag.getString("Text3")));
217                    sign.setLine(3, jsonToColourCode(tag.getString("Text4")));
218                    state.update(true);
219                    return true;
220                }
221                return false;
222            }
223            case "skull" -> {
224                if (state instanceof Skull skull) {
225                    CompoundTag skullOwner = ((CompoundTag) this.tag.getValue().get("SkullOwner"));
226                    if (skullOwner == null) {
227                        return true;
228                    }
229                    String player = skullOwner.getString("Name");
230                    if (player == null || player.isEmpty()) {
231                        return false;
232                    }
233                    try {
234                        skull.setOwningPlayer(Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(player));
235                        skull.update(true);
236                    } catch (Exception e) {
237                        e.printStackTrace();
238                    }
239                    return true;
240                }
241                return false;
242            }
243        }
244        return false;
245    }
246
247    public String getId() {
248        String tileid = this.tag.getString("id").toLowerCase();
249        if (tileid.startsWith("minecraft:")) {
250            tileid = tileid.replace("minecraft:", "");
251        }
252        return tileid;
253    }
254
255    public List<CompoundTag> serializeInventory(ItemStack[] items) {
256        List<CompoundTag> tags = new ArrayList<>();
257        for (int i = 0; i < items.length; ++i) {
258            if (items[i] != null) {
259                Map<String, Tag> tagData = serializeItem(items[i]);
260                tagData.put("Slot", new ByteTag((byte) i));
261                tags.add(new CompoundTag(tagData));
262            }
263        }
264        return tags;
265    }
266
267    public Map<String, Tag> serializeItem(ItemStack item) {
268        Map<String, Tag> data = new HashMap<>();
269        data.put("id", new StringTag(item.getType().name()));
270        data.put("Damage", new ShortTag(item.getDurability()));
271        data.put("Count", new ByteTag((byte) item.getAmount()));
272        if (!item.getEnchantments().isEmpty()) {
273            List<CompoundTag> enchantmentList = new ArrayList<>();
274            for (Entry<Enchantment, Integer> entry : item.getEnchantments().entrySet()) {
275                Map<String, Tag> enchantment = new HashMap<>();
276                enchantment.put("id", new StringTag(entry.getKey().toString()));
277                enchantment.put("lvl", new ShortTag(entry.getValue().shortValue()));
278                enchantmentList.add(new CompoundTag(enchantment));
279            }
280            Map<String, Tag> auxData = new HashMap<>();
281            auxData.put("ench", new ListTag(CompoundTag.class, enchantmentList));
282            data.put("tag", new CompoundTag(auxData));
283        }
284        return data;
285    }
286
287}
